overview: Falling Tissue is a short film that captures the simplicity and beauty of a moment that would have otherwise gone unnoticed. The film opens with a shot of a white tissue lying on a chair in a plain and unremarkable room. Suddenly, the tissue falls to the floor, drifting like a leaf in the wind.
tagline: An unexpected fall. A simple tissue. And a moment that changes everything.
title: Falling Tissue
